title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 9, 2015, Morris was traded to the Detroit Pistons, along with Reggie Bullock and Danny Granger, in exchange for a 2020 second-round draft pick. He made his debut for the Pistons on October 27, 2015, in the team's season-opener against the Atlanta Hawks.

title: Marcus Morris Contract and Salary Details | SalarySwish
snippet: He was drafted 14th overall by the Houston Rockets in the 1st round of the 2011 draft. He has signed 7 contracts worth a total value of $111,458,953. He is represented by the agent Chafie Fields of Wasserman Basketball.
